typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empId as string,
		empName as string,
		dob as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> EmployeeJson
DerivedDob filter(!(empName == 'NULL' && isNull(dob))) ~> FilterInvalid
EmployeeJson derive(dob = toDate(dob, 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		empId = toInteger(empId)) ~> DerivedDob
FilterInvalid sink(input(
		employee_id as integer,
		last_name as string,
		first_name as string,
		dob as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		employee_id = empId,
		last_name = empName,
		dob
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkToAdWorks
